column1: Surovikino (Russian: Сурови́кино) is a town and the administrative center of Surovikinsky District in Volgograd Oblast
column3: located at the confluence of the Chir and Don Rivers (Tsimlyansk Reservoir)
column5: the administrative center of the oblast. Population: 20

column1: It was founded as a settlement around the Surovikino railway station
column2: which opened in 1900. It was granted town status in 1966.

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Surovikino serves as the administrative center of Surovikinsky District. As an administrative division
column3: it is incorporated within Surovikinsky District as the town of district significance of Surovikino. As a municipal division
column4: the town of district significance of Surovikino is incorporated within Surovikinsky Municipal District as Surovikino Urban Settlement.
